name: Jammin' 4 Jesus - Word Search
description:
Play Jammin' 4 Jesus - Word Search Game!

Its a fun bible themed word search game the whole family can enjoy!

Play in Classic Mode to play at your own pace
Play Timed Mode for more of a Challenge
Play Sequential Mode and find words in order

With 3 Difficulty Levels: Easy, Medium, and Hard

With 5 Level Categories:
Ark Animals
Bible Guys
Bible Gals
Bible Places
Bible Books

Try it Today!
